blogPost.excerpt: VECA is our plug and play, prebuilt intent recognition system for post-sales eCommerce support. Trained on 10 million user queries, automate your conversations with just a click.
blogPost.body: VECA is our plug and play, prebuilt intent recognition system for post-sales eCommerce support. Trained on 10 million user queries, automate your conversations with just a click.
blogPost.title: VECA - Your eCommerce assistant
blogPost.author: Neeraj Thakur

localize.description: VECA是我们即插即用、预建的意图识别系统，用于售后电商支持。训练了1000万用户的查询，只需点击一下就可以自动对话。
VECA是我們即插即用、預建的意圖識別系統，用於售後電商支持。訓練了1000萬用戶的查詢，只需點擊一下就可以自動對話。

previous.excerpt: Bring your projects up to a whole new level using Artify's illustrations plugin, now available directly inside Figma. Through this new plugin you can search & import over 5000 illustrations with over 70 different design styles directly in your figma projects.
previous.title: 5000+ illustrations for Figma by Artify - Figma plugin with 5000 illustrations in 70+ design styles

localize.description: 使用Artify的插图插件将你的项目提升到一个全新的水平，现在可以直接在Figma内部使用。通过这个新的插件，你可以直接在你的Figma项目中搜索和导入超过5000张具有70多种不同设计风格的插图。
localize.tagline: Figma插件，拥有70+设计风格的5000张插图。

localize.description: 使用Artify的插圖插件將你的項目提升到一個全新的水平，現在可以直接在Figma內部使用。通過這個新的插件，你可以直接在你的Figma項目中搜索和導入超過5000張具有70多種不同設計風格的插圖。
localize.tagline: Figma插件，擁有70+設計風格的5000張插圖。

next.excerpt: Join the Stock Rewards Revolution! Get fractional shares of the brands you love as you shop, automatically. No need to "tap to activate". Simply link as many bank accounts as you like and sit back and earn Stock Rewards.
next.title: Bits of Stock - The Stock Rewards App

localize.description: 加入股票奖励革命! 在您购物时自动获得您喜爱的品牌的零碎股份。无需 "点击激活"。只需连接任意数量的银行账户，便可坐享股票奖励。
加入股票獎勵革命! 在您購物時自動獲得您喜愛的品牌的零碎股份。無需 "點擊激活"。只需連接任意數量的銀行賬戶，便可坐享股票獎勵。
